an5.43:1.1: Atha kho anathapindiko gahapati yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinnam kho anathapindikam gahapatim bhagava etadavoca:
an5.43:2.1: â€œPancime, gahapati, dhamma ittha kanta manapa dullabha lokasmim.
an5.43:2.3: Ayu, gahapati, ittho kanto manapo dullabho lokasmim;
an5.43:2.4: vanno ittho kanto manapo dullabho lokasmim;
an5.43:2.5: sukham ittham kantam manapam dullabham lokasmim;
an5.43:2.6: yaso ittho kanto manapo dullabho lokasmim;
an5.43:2.7: sagga ittha kanta manapa dullabha lokasmim.
an5.43:2.8: Ime kho, gahapati, panca dhamma ittha kanta manapa dullabha lokasmim.
an5.43:3.1: Imesam kho, gahapati, pancannam dhammanam itthanam kantanam manapanam dullabhanam lokasmim na ayacanahetu va patthanahetu va patilabham vadami.
an5.43:3.2: Imesam kho, gahapati, pancannam dhammanam itthanam kantanam manapanam dullabhanam lokasmim ayacanahetu va patthanahetu va patilabho abhavissa, ko idha kena hayetha?
an5.43:4.1: Na kho, gahapati, arahati ariyasavako ayukamo ayum ayacitum va abhinanditum va ayussa vapi hetu.
an5.43:4.2: Ayukamena, gahapati, ariyasavakena ayusamvattanika patipada patipajjitabba.
an5.43:4.3: Ayusamvattanika hissa patipada patipanna ayupatilabhaya samvattati.
an5.43:4.4: So labhi hoti ayussa dibbassa va manusassa va.
an5.43:5.1: Na kho, gahapati, arahati ariyasavako vannakamo vannam ayacitum va abhinanditum va vannassa vapi hetu.
an5.43:5.2: Vannakamena, gahapati, ariyasavakena vannasamvattanika patipada patipajjitabba.
an5.43:5.3: Vannasamvattanika hissa patipada patipanna vannapatilabhaya samvattati.
an5.43:5.4: So labhi hoti vannassa dibbassa va manusassa va.
an5.43:6.1: Na kho, gahapati, arahati ariyasavako sukhakamo sukham ayacitum va abhinanditum va sukhassa vapi hetu.
an5.43:6.2: Sukhakamena, gahapati, ariyasavakena sukhasamvattanika patipada patipajjitabba.
an5.43:6.3: Sukhasamvattanika hissa patipada patipanna sukhapatilabhaya samvattati.
an5.43:6.4: So labhi hoti sukhassa dibbassa va manusassa va.
an5.43:7.1: Na kho, gahapati, arahati ariyasavako yasakamo yasam ayacitum va abhinanditum va yasassa vapi hetu.
an5.43:7.2: Yasakamena, gahapati, ariyasavakena yasasamvattanika patipada patipajjitabba.
an5.43:7.3: Yasasamvattanika hissa patipada patipanna yasapatilabhaya samvattati.
an5.43:7.4: So labhi hoti yasassa dibbassa va manusassa va.
an5.43:8.1: Na kho, gahapati, arahati ariyasavako saggakamo saggam ayacitum va abhinanditum va sagganam vapi hetu.
an5.43:8.2: Saggakamena, gahapati, ariyasavakena saggasamvattanika patipada patipajjitabba.
an5.43:8.3: Saggasamvattanika hissa patipada patipanna saggapatilabhaya samvattati.
